items.question: How does LOWIS, your personal AI coach, work?
items.answer: LOWIS is your personal AI coach that monitors 40+ indicators in real-time. It's not a simple chatbot. When LOWIS detects changes in your sleep, stress, or emotional state, it automatically adjusts your meal plan. But LOWIS isn't alone: our team of experts reviews your progress every week and manually refines your plan. It's the combination of AI + humans that makes the difference.

items.question: What exactly are the 40+ monitored indicators?
items.answer: LOWIS monitors: NUTRITION (calories, protein, carbs, fats, 22 micronutrients), HEALTH (sleep, stress, digestion, pain, hydration), PHYSIOLOGY (weight, measurements, physical activity, menstrual cycle for women), BEHAVIOR (personal notes, special events, how you feel). While MyFitnessPal only counts calories, LOWIS sees the complete picture.

items.question: Why track 22 micronutrients and not just calories?
items.answer: Calories only tell part of the story. The 22 micronutrients (vitamins A, B, C, D, E, K, iron, calcium, zinc, magnesium...) are essential for: ENERGY (iron fights fatigue), METABOLISM (B vitamins burn fat), IMMUNITY (vitamin C and zinc protect you), SKIN and HAIR (biotin and zinc). An invisible deficiency can sabotage your weight loss even with a perfect calorie deficit. LOWIS detects these deficiencies and adjusts your diet.

items.question: How does the intelligent food scan work?
items.answer: Just take a photo of your plate or a product's barcode. LOWIS AI automatically identifies the foods, estimates portions, and calculates complete nutritional values (calories, macros AND 22 micronutrients). Our specialized database recognizes thousands of dishes from around the world. No manual searching — photograph and continue your day.

items.question: How does LOWIS analyze my personal notes?
items.answer: LOWIS understands your real life. In the app, you can write or record notes about: your stress, special events (dinner, trip, celebration), new symptoms, or obstacles. BOTH the LOWIS AI AND our expert team read your notes: LOWIS analyzes instantly and adjusts your plan, then your expert coach reviews it the following week. You're not a number, you're a person that LOWIS understands.

items.question: Why do other diets fail but LOWIS doesn't?
items.answer: Classic diets give you a rigid plan and leave you alone. 95% of people regain lost weight. LOWIS is different: we monitor 40+ indicators, LOWIS adapts to your daily life like a personal coach, and our experts adjust weekly. It's 360° support, not just a meal list.

items.question: How does the free first week work?
items.answer: Simply fill out your profile to personalize your plan based on your 40+ indicators. Full access for one week, no credit card required. See the results before you decide. After, continue at 199 DH/week or do nothing — your choice.

items.question: Is losing 1 to 2.5 kg per week really possible?
items.answer: Yes, that's our guaranteed goal. By eating smart (not less, just better combined), most of our users achieve these results. The LOWIS protocol optimizes each meal according to your metabolism.

items.question: What if I have allergies or dietary restrictions?
items.answer: During the initial onboarding, you indicate all your allergies, intolerances, and dietary preferences. LOWIS integrates them into your meal plan. The system will NEVER recommend foods you can't eat. You can update your restrictions at any time.

items.question: When will I feel changes (beyond weight)?
items.answer: Tangible results per week: Weight: 1-2.5 kg/week (guaranteed). Energy: many report +25% in 3-5 days. Digestion: noticeable improvement in 1-2 weeks. Mental clarity: reduced stress in 5-7 days. Overall well-being: emotional difference in 2 weeks. The key: LOWIS adapts your plan every day based on how you feel, not just numbers.

items.question: Do I have to follow a strict diet to lose weight?
items.answer: No. LOWIS is not a restrictive diet. You keep your favorite dishes — Mediterranean, Asian, your local cuisine — we teach you to combine them smartly. Lasting habits, not unsustainable efforts.

items.question: Does the app recognize my local dishes?
items.answer: Absolutely! Over 2000 recipes from around the world: Mediterranean, Asian, European, Latin American... Each dish analyzed with nutritional precision. Designed for global cuisines.

items.question: What's the difference with calorie counters?
items.answer: Calorie counters leave you alone with numbers. LOWIS monitors 40+ indicators (sleep, stress, cycle, digestion...), LOWIS reacts instantly like a personal coach, and our nutritionists adjust your plan weekly. Real support, not a calculator.

items.question: How does LOWIS adapt to intermittent fasting?
items.answer: Special plans optimized for fasting: ideal meal distribution, adapted hydration, and recommendations to maintain your energy. The app automatically adapts to your fasting rhythm.

items.question: What if I slip up one day?
items.answer: It's expected and normal. LOWIS immediately corrects the trajectory without guilt. A slip doesn't destroy your progress — we adjust together and keep going. Zero judgment, only solutions.

items.question: Can I cancel whenever I want?
items.answer: Yes, 1-click from the app. No commitment, no penalty. You keep access until the end of your period. The first week is free without credit card — you decide after seeing the results.

items.question: What's the real difference between LOWIS and other apps?
items.answer: Calorie counters (MyFitnessPal, Yazio) give you numbers and leave you alone. LOWIS is different: 1) COMPLETE MONITORING: 40+ indicators vs just calories, 2) AUTOMATIC ADAPTATION: LOWIS adjusts your plan when you sleep poorly, are stressed, or have an event, 3) HUMAN EXPERTS: our nutritionists review your case every week, 4) GLOBAL DATABASE: 2000+ recipes from around the world. It's an intelligent personal coach + expert team, not a calculator.

finalCta.subtitle: 7 free days to see it works. Lose up to 12 kg in 6 weeks.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At LOWIS, we place the utmost importance on protecting your personal data. This privacy policy informs you about how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our application and services.

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.content: The data controller is Organicare SARLAU, a Moroccan company.

dataCollected.title: Data We Collect
dataCollected.intro: To provide you with a personalized nutritional service, we collect the following categories of data:

purposes.title: Processing Purposes
items: Personalize your nutritional plan and recommendations
Analyze your meals and calculate nutritional intake
Track your health indicators and adapt your program
Send you personalized notifications and reminders
Process your payments and manage your subscription
Improve our services and develop new features
Ensure the security of your account and prevent fraud

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.intro: We process your data on the following legal bases:

items.description: For sensitive health data, you give your consent during registration
To provide the services you have subscribed to
To improve our services and ensure security
For the retention of billing data

recipients.title: Data Recipients
recipients.intro: Your data may be shared with the following providers, strictly within the scope of providing our services:
recipients.noSale: We never sell your personal data to third parties.

transfers.title: International Transfers
transfers.content: Your data is primarily hosted in the European Union. In case of transfer to third countries, we ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place (standard contractual clauses, certifications).

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.intro: We retain your data for the following periods:

items.duration: Duration of your subscription, deleted upon request

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.intro: In accordance with GDPR and Moroccan Law 09-08, you have the following rights:

items.description: Obtain a copy of your personal data
Correct your inaccurate or incomplete data
Request deletion of your data
Receive your data in a structured format
Object to certain processing
Restrict the processing of your data
Withdraw your consent at any time

rights.howTo: To exercise these rights, contact us at the address below.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.content: We use essential cookies for the application to function and analytical cookies to improve our services. You can manage your cookie preferences in the application settings.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data: encryption of data in transit and at rest, secure authentication, restricted data access, regular security audits.

minors.title: Minors
minors.content: LOWIS is intended for persons aged 16 and over. If you are under 16, you must obtain consent from your parents or legal guardians before using our services.

changes.title: Changes
changes.content: We may update this privacy policy. In case of substantial changes, we will inform you by email or through the application. The date of the last update is indicated at the top of this page.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions about this policy or your personal data, contact our Data Protection Officer:

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to LOWIS. These Terms and Conditions of Use govern your access to and use of the LOWIS application and its associated services. By using LOWIS, you accept these terms in their entirety.

items.definition: The mobile and web application for nutritional tracking and its associated services.
Any natural person using the LOWIS application.
All the features offered by LOWIS: nutritional tracking, personalized meal plans, AI meal analysis, coaching.
All information, texts, images, data that you submit through the application.

eligibility.title: Access Conditions
items: Be at least 16 years old (or have parental consent)
Not use the service for illegal purposes
Maintain the confidentiality of your login credentials

items.description: Recording and analysis of your daily meals with macronutrient calculation.
Meal programs adapted to your goals (weight loss, maintenance, mass gain).
Automatic food recognition by photo and nutritional estimation.
Personalized advice based on your progress and eating habits.

subscription.title: Subscription and Payment
items: Free trial: 7 days of full access with no commitment
Weekly subscription: automatic billing each week
Prices are shown including taxes and may vary by country
subscription.cancellation: You can cancel your subscription at any time from the app settings. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current period.
subscription.refund: In accordance with regulations, you have a 14-day withdrawal right for any new subscription, unless you have started using the service.

health.title: Health Disclaimer
health.content: LOWIS is a nutritional tracking aid tool and does not constitute medical advice. The information provided does not replace a consultation with a healthcare professional. Before starting any diet or meal program, consult your doctor, especially if you have pre-existing medical conditions.
health.disclaimer: LOWIS cannot be held responsible for consequences resulting from the use of information or recommendations provided by the application.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.intro: By using LOWIS, you agree to:
items: Not post illegal, offensive, or inappropriate content
Not attempt to compromise the application's security
userContent.license: You retain ownership of your content. By submitting it, you grant LOWIS a non-exclusive license to use it within the framework of our services.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.content: The LOWIS application, its design, features, and all its content (texts, images, logos, algorithms) are protected by intellectual property rights and belong to Organicare SARLAU or its licensors. Any unauthorized reproduction is prohibited.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content: LOWIS strives to provide a quality service but does not guarantee the absolute accuracy of nutritional information. Our liability is limited to the amount of your subscription for the last 12 months. We are not responsible for indirect damages or data loss.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your account in case of violation of these terms, especially in case of fraudulent or abusive use of the service. You can delete your account at any time from the settings.

modifications.title: Changes to Terms
modifications.content: We may modify these terms. Substantial changes will be notified to you by email or through the application at least 30 days before they take effect. Your continued use after that date constitutes acceptance.

law.title: Applicable Law
law.content: These terms are governed by Moroccan law. In case of dispute, the courts of Casablanca will have sole jurisdiction, after an attempt at amicable resolution.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions about these terms:

cookieConsent.title: This site uses cookies
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze our site traffic.

intro.title: About this policy
intro.content: This policy explains how LOWIS uses cookies and similar technologies when you visit our website.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: A cookie is a small text file stored on your device when you visit a website. Cookies allow the site to remember your preferences and improve your browsing experience.

essential.title: Essential cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the site to function. They store your language preference and consent choices.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors use our site. This information is used to improve our services.
analytics.note: These cookies are only activated after your explicit consent.

manageCookies.title: How to manage your cookies
manageCookies.content: You can change your cookie preferences at any time using the button below or by configuring your browser settings.
manageCookies.browserSettings: Most browsers allow you to block or delete cookies. Check your browser documentation for more information.

thirdParty.title: Third-party cookies
thirdParty.content: We use Google Analytics to analyze our site traffic. Google may collect information in accordance with its own privacy policy.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: For any questions about our use of cookies, contact us at
